body.p: A pre-ganglionic neuron of the sympathetic nervous system will synapse in the dorsal root ganglion chain.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Groups of cell bodies are referred to as ganglia. There are two distinct sets of ganglia that lie in the paravertebral region: dorsal root ganglia and sympathetic chain ganglia.
Correct. A preganglionic neurons of the sympathetic nervous system will synapse onto neurons in sympathetic chain ganglia, not in dorsal root ganglia.

part.hint: Dorsal root ganglia contain cell bodies of sensory afferents.
